name: Rise (itch) (garretwied)
description:
Rise is set in a post apocalyptic world setting where sea levels have risen to the point where most of the world is flooded.

Take Scuba-Man on an adventure to make it to his submarine and search for lost gold in the depths of the sea. Be be careful, the journey is long and treacherous, and you may not be alone in the waters!

Credits:

*I designed the game, but all assets came from the Unity Asset Store all of which are used in some way, shape, or form. Sound came from the YouTube Audio Library.
